title: Quarterstaves
content: 8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Fly Trap: Chance to Ensnare target if it is not a plant or a beast. Topple Quarterstaff +1 1d8 (1d6) +1 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +1 Topple Rain Dancer 1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Create Water Level 1 Transmutation Spell Topple Spiderstep Staff 1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Spider Step: Immune to being Enwebbed Topple Staff of Arcane Blessing 1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Mystra's Blessing: Bless grants an additional 1d4 to Saving Throws and Weapon Attack Rolls, and additional 2d4 to Spell At
